select.placeholder: Gerenciar substituições de verificação de passaporte.

unverify.title: Não verificar e Reiniciar
unverify.description: Isto permitirá e exigirá que o usuário verifique novamente.

punish.title: Punição ({action})
punish.description: This will punish the user with the set failed action.

verify.title: Verify
verify.description: This will force-verify the user and give the verified role.

manual_verification_warning: This user is blocked from verifying in the future, they will have to be verified manually by server staff.
